person.headline: Summer Intern - Financial Technology Associates Program at Citadel Investment Group
person.summary: Computer Science student; focus is on algorithms and software development. Experienced in C, C++, C#, Java, Python, MySQL, Javascript, HTML/CSS.
person.honors: Hispanic Heritage Youth Awards national winner in engineering & mathematics category (2007) USA Math Olympiad participant (4 times) Intel Science Talent Search semifinalist Siemens Competition semifinalist National Merit Finalist/Scholarship Recipient AP National Scholar Research Science Institute participant (2007)
person.interests: ultimate frisbee, soccer, Arabic, Spanish, cooking

company.name: Center for Digital Business, MIT Sloan School of Management

position.title: Summer Intern - Financial Technology Associates Program
position.summary: C++ software developer for options market-making technology. Emphasis on software optimization and realtime system performance monitoring. C++, Javascript, SQL and native UNIX tools for profiling.

position.title: MIT Campus Ambassador
position.summary: Trained with Sun technologies (Java, NetBeans, OpenSolaris, mySQL) to make presentations to students. Currently working toward certification as a Sun Certified Programmer for the Java Platform, Standard Edition 6

position.title: Software Development Intern
position.summary: One-month internship. Built rules-based web application to help company keep track of various administrative tasks. SQL, C#, Microsoft Silverlight.

position.title: Undergraduate Researcher, Imaging Platform
position.summary: Added to MATLAB-based software package to correct and analyze cell images, using the Variational Bayes framework to model probability distributions about classification beliefs.

education.activities: Steward - Phi Delta Theta Fraternity, President - MIT Association of Student Activities, Treasurer - Harvard-MIT Math Tournament, Undergraduate Association Senate, Mens' Ultimate Frisbee, Associate Advisor, Co-Coordinator - Discover EECS Freshman Pre-Orientation Program
